rxjs-debugging.config.title: RxJS Debugging
rxjs-debugging.config.hideLiveLogWhenSto: When enabled, live log values are hidden automatically after stopping the debugger.
rxjs-debugging.config.showLogPointRecomm: When enabled, recommended log points will be shown automatically. Hint: You can toggle this setting using the related command in the command palette as well.
rxjs-debugging.config.logLevel: Internal log level for the extension. (reload required)
rxjs-debugging.command.toggleLogPointRec: Toggle Display of Log Point Recommendations
